title: Combined In Situ STEM and SEM Investigation of Fe-Ru Nanocatalysts
content: It is critical to develop innovative catalysts to improve the synthesis of chemicals and reduce the cost of industrial processes. To this end, bimetallic nanoparticles are of great importance as the synergy between the two metals can create unique catalytic properties [1, 2]. However, changes in morphology and composition in a reactive environment can significantly alter the chemical properties of the catalysts [3-5].
